chartPage.name: Workload
chartPage.query: select u.id, count(issues.id), login from issues join users u on assigned_to_id = u.id group by u.id, u.login
chartPage.title: workload

chartPage.name: Issues by project/status
chartPage.query: select count(*), status_id, project_id, status.name, projects.name from issues join issue_statuses status on status_id = status.id join projects on project_id = projects.id group by status_id, project_id
chartPage.title: Issues by project/status

chartPage.name: Issues by project/tracker
chartPage.query: select count(*), tracker_id, project_id, t.name, projects.name from issues join trackers t on tracker_id = t.id join projects on project_id = projects.id group by tracker_id, project_id
chartPage.title: Issues by project/tracker

chartPage.name: Issues by project/priority
chartPage.query: select count(*), priority_id, issues.project_id, priority.name, projects.name from issues join enumerations priority on priority_id = priority.id join projects on issues.project_id = projects.id group by priority_id, issues.project_id
chartPage.title: Issues by project/priority

chartPage.name: Issues by priority
chartPage.query: select priority_id, count(*), priority.name from issues join enumerations priority on issues.priority_id = priority.id where issues.project_id = %{#project.id} group by priority.id
chartPage.title: Issues by priority

chartPage.name: Issues by status
chartPage.query: select status_id, count(*), status.name from issues join issue_statuses status on status_id = status.id where project_id = %{#project.id} group by status_id
chartPage.title: Issues by status

chartPage.name: Issues by tracker/status
chartPage.query: select count(*), status_id, tracker_id, status.name, tracker.name from issues join issue_statuses status on status_id = status.id join trackers tracker on tracker_id = tracker.id where project_id = %{#project.id} group by status_id, tracker_id
chartPage.title: Issues by tracker/status

chartPage.name: Issues by date
chartPage.query: select count(*), 'anno-mese', concat(Year(created_on),'-', Month(created_on)) data from issues where project_id = %{#project.id} group by data order by Year(created_on), Month(created_on)
chartPage.title: Issues by date
